meanings.definition: The act of being a godmother.
meanings.sent1: Her godmothering of the child was filled with love and care.
meanings.sent2: She takes her godmothering duties very seriously.
meanings.sent3: The godmothering at the baptism was a heartwarming moment.
meanings.sent4: Her godmothering was like a guiding light in the child's life.
meanings.sent5: The godmothering bond between them was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: The role or relationship of a godmother.
meanings.sent1: In the family, her godmothering was greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The godmothering she provided was invaluable to the child.
meanings.sent3: Her godmothering duties included spoiling the child with gifts.
meanings.sent4: The godmothering connection between them was special and cherished.
meanings.sent5: She embraced her godmothering role with joy and dedication.

meanings.definition: To act as a godmother to someone.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys godmothering her niece and nephew.
meanings.sent2: She will be godmothering the newborn at the christening.
meanings.sent3: Godmothering the child brought her great happiness.
meanings.sent4: She is godmothering the young girl with love and support.
meanings.sent5: Her godmothering of the twins was a true blessing.
